definitions.title: Qal
definitions.body: Pf. consec. [[וְעָֽנְשׁוּ]] De 22:19 (2 acc.); Impf. [[וַיַּעֲנשׁ]] 2Ch 36:3 (2 acc.; ‖ 2Ki 23:33 supr.); Inf. cstr. [[עֲנוֹשׁ]] Pr 17:26 ([[לְ]] pers.); = punish (in gen.) [[עֲנׇשׁ־]] Pr 21:11; Pt. pass. [[עֲנוּשִׁם]] Am 2:8 those fined, mulcted.

definitions.title: Qal
definitions.body: Inf. abs. [[עָנוֹשׁ]] [[יֵעָנֵשׁ]] Ex 21:22 (E) he shall be strictly fined; more gen. Pf. [[נֶעֱנׇ֑שׁוּ]] Pr 22:3 be mulcted, punished = Pr 27:12.
